section_title: Payments by Treasury in respect of retired allowances.
section_text: 8 1 The Treasury may undertake the payment of any retired allowances granted, on a scale and in accordance with conditions approved by the Treasury, by His late Majesty or by His present Majesty to or in respect of persons who have been members of the Household of His late Majesty or of His present Majesty. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

section_title: Charge of payments under this Act.
section_text: 11 The sums required . . .  , and for the payment of the retired allowances payable by the Treasury under this Act, . . .  , shall be charged on and paid out of the Consolidated Fund . . .  , and shall be paid at such times and in such manner as the Treasury may direct; . . .

section_title: Adjustments in respect of parts of years.
section_text: 12 Where any of the yearly payments, . . .  , mentioned in this Act fall to be made in respect only of a part of a year, such adjustments of and in relation to those payments . . .   shall be made as may in the circumstances of the case appear to the Treasury to be required.

section_title: †Continuance of enactments commencement, repeal and short title.
section_text: 13 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  5 This Act may be cited as the Civil List Act 1936.
